selector: avatar image on user profile page
text area with placeholder 'Tell us what you think...'

value: A very long message that will definitely exceed the minimum height of the text area. This text should be long enough to force the appearance of a vertical scrollbar. We need to ensure that the content is so extensive that it cannot fit within the visible area, thereby triggering the overflow mechanism. This helps us test the scroll functionality accurately and ensure that the user can navigate through the entire input without issues.
